sentence.text: Individuals with biallelic mitotic spindle assembly checkpoint or mitotic spindle assembly checkpoint mutations have a high risk of embryonal tumors, and here we show that their cells display severe cAMP biosynthetic process impairment.

MVA due to biallelic fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway mutations, or of unknown cause, is not associated with embryonal tumors and cells from these individuals show minimal cAMP biosynthetic process deficiency.

entity.text: fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway
